Ọ na-asụ Italian, ebe ọ mụtara ihe n'aka onye nkuzi ya kemgbe ọ kwagara Ịtali na 2010 ma nwee nwanne nwoke. Acquah kwuru na ọ họọrọ uwe elu 94 na nraranye nke nne ya, onye nwere ihe mberede ụgbọ ala ma lanarị n'afọ ahụ.
Amụrụ na Accra, Greater Accra, Ghana, Acquah bidoro ọrụ ya na Glentoran Football Academy na Sunyani, Ghana, nke Christopher Forsythe onye Irish National sitere na Sunyani guzobere
N'oge ọrụ Glentoran ya, Acquah nyere ya dị ka "Onye ọkpọ egwuregwu Ghana kacha mma n'okpuru-14".

O mechara kwaga Bechem United dị ka klọb Northern Irish na-enweghị ike ịbịanye aka na ya, n'ihi nsogbu ikike ọrụ, n'agbanyeghị na ya na Christopher Forsythe gara Belfast iji soro ndị otu mbụ zụọ. N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Bechem United megide klọb Ịtali Empoli.
Na 1 Febụwarị 2010, Palermo bịanyere aka na Acquah site na klọb Ghana D.C
United Agogo n'efu, mana ego € 500,000 nke onye nnọchi anya gara SCMG Sport Consulting & Management GmbH. FIGC kwụrụ Palermo ụgwọ n'ihi na ọ mebiri iwu nke atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012
FIGC chọpụtara na Acquah bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na onye nnọchi anya ahụ na June 2009 n'ihi na ọ nweghị ike isonyere klọb ọ bụla n'ụgbọ ahụ ruo mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na asatọ.
